text.text_translated:
Consumerism is the idea that it is good to buy many things. But a new idea is starting. It is the opposite of consumerism. This new idea is called 'buy nothing'.

This idea started in Canada in the 1990s. Then it moved to the US. In the US, people buy too many things on Black Friday and Cyber Monday. The 'buy nothing' idea was a movement against buying too much.

There is a special day called 'Buy Nothing Day'. On this day, people join protests against buying too much. Some people cut up their credit cards.

All year, there are 'Buy Nothing' groups. These groups help people share things. They also help people fix things they already have.
